source.sqlReaderQuery:
select CustomerID,
NameStyle,
Title,
FirstName
From SalesLT.Customer

activities.name: Copy data from SQL to ADLS by Year
get max modified date table user

source.sqlReaderQuery:
Select max([Last_m]) as Last_m
from source.tbluser

dependsOn.activity: get max modified date table user

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * from source.tbluser
where last_m <= '@{activity('get max modified date table user').output.firstRow.Last_m}'
And Last_m >'@{activity('get last laoded table control').output.firstRow.LastLoadDate}'
